title: Riding Drag
description: A Chinese-American traveling salesman and snake oil salesman picks up a runaway prostitute who's not what she seems -- but when trying to survive on the margins of late 19th-century frontier society, no one is. Contains cross-dressing, deceptive gender-bending, and (as the title might imply) more than one kind of drag.Words:22549 completeArt by staringatsuns
author: Shukyou
